outputs.output_descr:
The school will fulfill the educational needs for the low basic education level and prepare the students for the higher education stage. It will serve 880 pupils, 50% of them girls and 50% boys on an area of 3100m2. It will contain the following facilities:
•	17 Classrooms with area 52m2 per room.
•	Science Laboratory with area 86m2
•	Technology Lab with area 86m2
•	Computer Lab with area 86m2
•	Library with area 70m2
•	Admin Rooms (Head teacher, Teachers, Social Worker, Secretary, Kitchenette and Admin Toilet ) with total area 104m2
•	Canteen ( Small Grocery) with total area 20m2
•	Student's Toilet Building,  one for boys and girls it contains 10 separate WC's,  with total area 65m2
•	Shed with area 200m2

project_descr: 22 classrooms school with the necessary facilities constructed.
